SourceProxy.label: Programmable Source
SourceProxy.name: ProgrammableSource

Documentation.long_help: Executes a user supplied python script to produce an output dataset.
Documentation.short_help: Executes a python script to produce data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This source will execute a python script to produce an output dataset. The source keeps a copy of the python script in Script and creates a python Interpreter to run the script upon the first execution. To execute external python scripts on the ParaView server, use: execfile('full_path/script_name.py'). Documentation is found in the Programmable Filter chapter of the ParaView Guide.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable source.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs. To execute external python scripts on the ParaView server, use: execfile('full_path/script_name.py'). Documentation is found in the Programmable Filter chapter of the ParaView Guide.

StringVectorProperty.label: Script (RequestInformation)
StringVectorProperty.name: InformationScript
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is a python script that is executed during the RequestInformation pipeline pass. Use this to provide information such as WHOLE_EXTENT to the pipeline downstream.

StringVectorProperty.name: PythonPath
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: A semi-colon (;) separated list of directories to add to the python library search path.

SourceProxy.label: Live Programmable Source
SourceProxy.name: LiveProgrammableSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: A programmable source that can produce new data autonomously.

StringVectorProperty.label: Script (CheckNeedsUpdate)
StringVectorProperty.name: CheckNeedsUpdateScript
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the script to use to check if the filter/source has new data. This is only needed for "live" sources, that can cause data to be available outside of ParaView.
